name: Seek Upon The Unknown
description:
Seek Upon The Unknown is one of the thousands of game made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1!

Player goes to sleep by walking up to the bed in the lobby. The game is played inside the characters dream and you have to escape by completing some simple mazes. When completing you get 25 coins and you can use the coins to buy hats for your in-game character!

Game genre was supposed to be horror but turned out like a scary type game that isn't really scary but I hope you as a player enjoys it either way!
